SELECT RUM, ASSET_ID, LARGE_CATEGORY, MIDDLE_CATEGORY, ASSET_NAME, HIST_QTY, ACQUIRED_DATE, ACQUIRED_PRICE, MAKER, HIST_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.HIST_DATE DESC)AS RUM, B.ASSET_ID, (SELECT CAT_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CAT_ID = B.LARGE_CATEGORY) AS LARGE_CATEGORY, (SELECT CAT_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CAT_ID = B.MIDDLE_CATEGORY) AS MIDDLE_CATEGORY, B.ASSET_NAME, A.HIST_QTY, DATE_FORMAT(B.ACQUIRED_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d')AS ACQUIRED_DATE, B.ACQUIRED_PRICE, B.MAKER, A.HIST_STATUS FROM ASSETSHIST A,ASSETSINFO B WHERE A.ASSET_ID = B.ASSET_ID AND B.USAGE_STAUTS = 'U1'
) P WHERE P.RUM BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
